template.name: Program Info
template.comment:
****************************************************** * GAMESS VERSION = 22 FEB 2006 (R2) * * FROM IOWA STATE UNIVERSITY * * M.W.SCHMIDT, K.K.BALDRIDGE, J.A.BOATZ, S.T.ELBERT, * * M.S.GORDON, J.H.JENSEN, S.KOSEKI, N.MATSUNAGA, * * K.A.NGUYEN, S.J.SU, T.L.WINDUS, * * TOGETHER WITH M.DUPUIS, J.A.MONTGOMERY * * J.COMPUT.CHEM. 14, 1347-1363(1993) * ****************** IBM (AIX) VERSION *****************
SINCE 1993, STUDENTS AND POSTDOCS WORKING AT IOWA STATE UNIVERSITY AND ALSO IN THEIR VARIOUS JOBS AFTER LEAVING ISU HAVE MADE IMPORTANT CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE CODE: ... LYUDMILA SLIPCHENKO, JIE SONG, TETSUYA TAKETSUGU, SIMON WEBB.
ADDITIONAL CODE HAS BEEN PROVIDED BY COLLABORATORS IN OTHER GROUPS: IOWA STATE UNIVERSITY: JOE IVANIC, KLAUS RUEDENBERG ... UNIVERSITY OF NOTRE DAME: DAN CHIPMAN

****************************************************** * GAMESS VERSION = 12 JAN 2009 (R1) * * FROM IOWA STATE UNIVERSITY * * M.W.SCHMIDT, K.K.BALDRIDGE, J.A.BOATZ, S.T.ELBERT, * * M.S.GORDON, J.H.JENSEN, S.KOSEKI, N.MATSUNAGA, * * K.A.NGUYEN, S.J.SU, T.L.WINDUS, * * TOGETHER WITH M.DUPUIS, J.A.MONTGOMERY * * J.COMPUT.CHEM. 14, 1347-1363(1993) * **************** 64 BIT LINUX VERSION ****************
SINCE 1993, STUDENTS AND POSTDOCS WORKING AT IOWA STATE UNIVERSITY AND ALSO IN THEIR VARIOUS JOBS AFTER LEAVING ISU HAVE MADE IMPORTANT CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE CODE: ... SIMON WEBB, SOOHAENG YOO, FEDERICO ZAHARIEV
ADDITIONAL CODE HAS BEEN PROVIDED BY COLLABORATORS IN OTHER GROUPS: IOWA STATE UNIVERSITY: JOE IVANIC, KLAUS RUEDENBERG ... WASEDA UNIVERSITY: MASATO KOBAYASHI, TOMOKO AKAMA, HIROMI NAKAI
